REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit
Sub createRepord() GlobalScope.BasicLibraries.LoadLibrary("ALADIN") StatusBar(True) ToolBar(True) FormSizePrint() if oDoc.isReadOnly then Dim oFrame as Object
SetDocUserProperty("oUserID_lokal", iUserID("PrintInventur")) SetDocUserProperty("oClientID", iClientIDOffset(iUserID_lokal) + 31) SetDocUserProperty("oEinstellungsID_lokal", iEinstellungsID(iUserID_lokal))
if iEinstellungsID_lokal=1 _ or InStr(fsTableList,";Leistungsstamm_" & iEinstellungsID_lokal & ";") = 0 _ then SetDocUserProperty("oLeistungsstamm", "Leistungsstamm") else SetDocUserProperty("oLeistungsstamm", "Leistungsstamm_" & iEinstellungsID_lokal) end if
SetDocUserProperty("oTitle_lokal",sTitle(iUserID_lokal))
oFrame = StarDesktop.getCurrentFrame() oFrame.setTitle(sTitle_lokal &" - Druck Inventur")
Kontaktdaten.KontaktDaten() Leistungen.Leistungen() End if End Sub
Sub Document_ruecksetzen() Feld_fuellen("Anschrift_Eigen_1","Anschrift_Eigen_1") Feld_fuellen("Anschrift_Eigen_2","Anschrift_Eigen_2") Feld_fuellen("Anschrift_Eigen_3","Anschrift_Eigen_3") Feld_fuellen("Anschrift","Anschrift") Feld_fuellen("Document_Typ","Document_Typ") Feld_fuellen("Kontakt_Bez","Kontakt_Bez") Feld_fuellen("Kontakt","Kontakt") Feld_fuellen("Bankverbindung_Bez","Bankverbindung_Bez") Feld_fuellen("Bankverbindung","Bankverbindung") Feld_fuellen("Geschaeftsfuehrer_Bez","Geschaeftsfuehrer_Bez") Feld_fuellen("Firmendaten","Firmendaten") oDoc.getTextFields().refresh() End Sub
Function FieldContent(sField as string) as String Dim vField as Variant,vFieldMaster as Variant Dim sFieldName as String sFieldName = "com.sun.star.text.FieldMaster.User." + sField vFieldMaster = oDoc.getTextFieldMasters.getByName(sFieldName) FieldContent = vFieldMaster.Content End Function
Sub Feld_fuellen(sField as string,sInhalt as string ) Dim vField as Variant,vFieldMaster as Variant Dim sFieldName as String sFieldName = "com.sun.star.text.FieldMaster.User." + sField vFieldMaster = oDoc.getTextFieldMasters.getByName(sFieldName) vFieldMaster.Content = sInhalt End Sub
Sub Feld_loeschen(sField as string) Dim vField as Variant,vFieldMaster as Variant Dim sFieldName as String Dim bFound as boolean vField = oDoc.createInstance("com.sun.star.text.TextField.User") sFieldName = "com.sun.star.text.FieldMaster.User." + sField bFound = oDoc.getTextFieldMasters.hasbyname(sFieldName) if bFound Then vFieldMaster = oDoc.getTextFieldMasters.getByName(sFieldName) vFieldMaster.Content = "" vFieldMaster.dispose() End If End Sub
Function ifPageCount as Integer Dim oDocument As Object,oTextfield As Object,oCurElement As Object Dim iElementCount as integer oDocument = oDoc.CurrentController.Model oTextfield = oDocument.getTextfields.CreateEnumeration iElementCount=0 While oTextField.hasmoreElements oCurElement = oTextField.NextElement if oCurElement.SupportsService("com.sun.star.text.TextField.PageCount") and iElementCount=0 then ifPageCount=oCurElement.getPresentation(False) 'Print oCurElement.getPresentation(true), oCurElement.getAnchor.getString iElementCount=1 end if Wend End Function
Function ifInsertCarry(iPageCount) as Integer Dim oTables as Object Dim vTableLeistungen as Variant Dim vViewCursor as Variant if ifPageCount > iPageCount then ' wait 600 oTables = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTables") oTables = oDoc.getTextTables vTableLeistungen = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTable") vTableLeistungen = oTables.getByName("Leistungen") vViewCursor = oDoc.CurrentController.getViewCursor() vViewCursor.jumpToPage(iPageCount) vViewCursor.jumpToEndOfPage() If NOT IsEmpty(vViewCursor.Cell) then if vViewCursor.TextTable.Name = "Leistungen" then 'Print Mid(vViewCursor.Cell.CellName,2) & " " & vTableLeistungen.Rows.getCount if CLng(Mid(vViewCursor.Cell.CellName,2)) = CLng(vTableLeistungen.Rows.getCount) then ifInsertCarry = 0 elseif CLng(Mid(vViewCursor.Cell.CellName,2)) < CLng(vTableLeistungen.Rows.getCount) then ifInsertCarry = 1 End if else ifInsertCarry = 0 End if else ifInsertCarry = 0 End if else ifInsertCarry = 0 End if End Function
Function fInsertCarry(iCountInsert,sUebertrag,iPageCount) as Integer Dim oTables as Object Dim vTableLeistungen as Variant Dim vViewCursor as Variant Dim oCursorUebertrag as Object Dim vRowsLeistungen as Variant
oTables = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTables") oTables = oDoc.getTextTables vTableLeistungen = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTable") vTableLeistungen = oTables.getByName("Leistungen") vRowsLeistungen = vTableLeistungen.getRows() vRowsLeistungen.insertByIndex(iCountInsert-1,1) ' wait 600 oCursorUebertrag=vTableLeistungen.createCursorByCellName("B" & iCountInsert) oCursorUebertrag.CharWeight=com.sun.star.awt.FontWeight.BOLD oCursorUebertrag.paraAdjust = com.sun.star.style.ParagraphAdjust.RIGHT oCursorUebertrag.CharPosture = com.sun.star.awt.FontSlant.NONE oCursorUebertrag=vTableLeistungen.createCursorByCellName("F" & iCountInsert) oCursorUebertrag.CharWeight=com.sun.star.awt.FontWeight.BOLD oCursorUebertrag.CharPosture = com.sun.star.awt.FontSlant.NONE
vTableLeistungen.getCellByName("B" & iCountInsert).String="Übertrag:" vTableLeistungen.getCellByName("F" & iCountInsert).String=sUebertrag iCountInsert=iCountInsert+1 Do vRowsLeistungen.insertByIndex(iCountInsert-1,1) ' wait 600 vViewCursor = oDoc.CurrentController.getViewCursor() vViewCursor.jumpToPage(iPageCount+1) vViewCursor.jumpToStartOfPage() 'Print Mid(vViewCursor.Cell.CellName,2) &" = "& iCountInsert iCountInsert=iCountInsert+1 Loop Until CLng(Mid(vViewCursor.Cell.CellName,2)) = iCountInsert-1 oCursorUebertrag=vTableLeistungen.createCursorByCellName("B" & iCountInsert-1) oCursorUebertrag.CharWeight=com.sun.star.awt.FontWeight.BOLD oCursorUebertrag.paraAdjust = com.sun.star.style.ParagraphAdjust.RIGHT oCursorUebertrag.CharPosture = com.sun.star.awt.FontSlant.NONE oCursorUebertrag=vTableLeistungen.createCursorByCellName("F" & iCountInsert-1) oCursorUebertrag.CharWeight=com.sun.star.awt.FontWeight.BOLD oCursorUebertrag.CharPosture = com.sun.star.awt.FontSlant.NONE vTableLeistungen.getCellByName("B" & iCountInsert-1).String="Übertrag:" vTableLeistungen.getCellByName("F" & iCountInsert-1).String=sUebertrag fInsertCarry = iCountInsert End Function
Function flAnzahlLeistungen as long Dim sSQL1 as String Dim oRecord1 as Object sSQL1="select count(*) from "& sLeistungsstamm &" where Warenbestand > 0 and Warenbestand is not null" oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() flAnzahlLeistungen=oRecord1.getString(1) Wend End Function
Function sLeistungsstamm as String sLeistungsstamm=GetDocUserProperty("oLeistungsstamm") End Function
Function GetDocUserProperty(sPropertyName as String) As String Dim oUserProps As Object ' On Error Resume Next oUserProps = oDoc.DocumentProperties.getUserDefinedProperties() if oUserProps.getPropertySetInfo().hasPropertyByName(sPropertyName) = True then GetDocUserProperty = oUserProps.getPropertyValue(sPropertyName) else GetDocUserProperty = "" end if End Function
